name: Pandora's Tome
description:
A dungeon exploration RPG with minesweeper style combat.

Explore a procedurally generated dungeon filled with monsters and treasures. Defeat enemies to master weapons and unlock new skills. 

Your goal is to escape from the dungeon by climbing to the first floor. Each floor has a locked gate blocking the stairs, but one of the enemies has the key.  The monsters pose little threat to you, but they hide in the shadows. Use your cunning to defeat them!

This game is in an early state. Please let me know if you have any feedback.
